archimate:Product.name: AllenNLP
archimate:Product.documentation: https://allennlp.org/ AllenNLP: It is an Apache 2.0 NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks. Built on spaCy, it is simple to use and enables dynamic computation graphs, and provides a flexible data API that handles intelligent batching and padding. AllenNLP also offers high-level abstractions for common operations in working with text, and a modular and extensible experiment framework.
